name: Braai facilities
description: Outdoor braai areas with grills for cooking.

name: Campfires allowed
description: Designated areas where campfires are permitted.

name: Electricity (plug points)
description: Power outlets available for charging and appliances.

name: Drinking water (tap)
description: Safe drinking water available from taps on site.

name: Borehole water
description: Non-treated borehole water available for general use.

name: Showers (hot water)
description: Hot showers available in shared or private ablutions.

name: Showers (cold water)
description: Cold-water showers available in shared facilities.

name: Flush toilets
description: Standard flush toilets provided on site.

name: Long-drop toilets
description: Eco-style long-drop toilets available on site.

name: Dishwashing area
description: Designated sinks for washing dishes.

name: Cooking facilities (communal kitchen)
description: Communal kitchen equipped for meal preparation.

name: Caravan stands
description: Dedicated stands for caravans with level ground.

name: Tent stands
description: Designated camping stands for pitching tents.

name: Glamping tents
description: Luxury furnished tents with added comfort.

name: Cabins / chalets
description: Permanent wooden or brick units available for stay.

name: Backpacker dorms
description: Shared dormitory accommodation for budget travellers.

name: Private ablutions
description: Private bathroom facilities reserved for specific guests.

name: Car parking (uncovered)
description: Uncovered parking spaces available for vehicles.

name: Covered parking
description: Shaded or covered parking areas available.

name: Caravan hookups (water & power)
description: Water and power connections for caravans and campervans.

name: 4x4 access only
description: Access roads suitable only for 4x4 vehicles.

name: Wheelchair access
description: Facilities and paths accessible to wheelchair users.

name: Wi-Fi
description: Wireless internet available to guests.

name: Mobile signal (Vodacom)
description: Vodacom network reception available at the campsite.

name: Mobile signal (MTN)
description: MTN network reception available at the campsite.

name: Mobile signal (Cell C)
description: Cell C network reception available at the campsite.

name: Mobile signal (Telkom)
description: Telkom network reception available at the campsite.

name: Swimming pool
description: Outdoor or indoor swimming pool available on site.

name: Dam / lake access
description: Guests can access a dam or lake directly from the campsite.

name: River access
description: Direct access to a river for swimming or recreation.

name: Fishing allowed
description: Fishing is permitted at the campsite or nearby.

name: Canoeing / kayaking
description: Canoeing and kayaking activities available on site.

name: Hiking trails on site
description: Marked hiking trails accessible from the campsite.

name: Birdwatching
description: Good opportunities for birdwatching.

name: Mountain biking trails
description: Cycling and MTB trails accessible from the campsite.

name: Kids play area
description: Playground equipment or designated kids’ play area.

name: Game viewing (wildlife)
description: Opportunities for wildlife viewing on or near the site.

name: Horse riding
description: Horse riding activities available nearby or on site.

name: Camp shop (basics)
description: On-site shop providing basic supplies.

name: Restaurant / café
description: Restaurant or café available on site.

name: Bar
description: Licensed bar available for guests.

name: Laundry facilities
description: Washing machines or laundry service available.

name: Recycling bins
description: Facilities for sorting and recycling waste.

name: Trash bins
description: General rubbish bins provided on site.

name: Security (guarded gate)
description: Campsite has a guarded entrance or gate.

name: First aid station
description: Designated first aid or emergency assistance station.

name: Pets allowed
description: Guests may bring pets onto the campsite.

name: No pets allowed
description: Pets are not permitted on the property.

name: Dog-friendly (off-lead areas)
description: Dogs may be off-lead in designated areas.

name: Horse stables (bring your own)
description: Facilities to stable your own horse on site.

name: Shade trees
description: Shady areas provided by mature trees.

name: Wind shelter
description: Windbreaks or natural shelter available on site.

name: Scenic views
description: Campsite offers picturesque or panoramic views.

name: Quiet zone (no loud music)
description: Area designated for quiet and relaxation, no loud music allowed.

name: Firewood available
description: Firewood for campfires available for purchase on site.

name: Gas refills available
description: Gas refilling services available for campers.

name: Private site
description: Entire campsite or section reserved exclusively for your group.
